thread.section_title: Usgobuy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Usgobuy | www.usgobuy.com
thread.title: Crynd

author: Crynd
title: Crynd
text:
7th January:
My order has been cancelled and my money has been refunded.
Tracking Number: B1170204042796240
I have ordered a Buy for Me item which now has sold out at eBay and I don't have my money back after having selected the option for having my purchase's money back in case the item doesn't get bought. It also shows how inefficient the page is, as one expects to have the item bought after having paid.
They've answered back and clarified a couple of my questions regarding the Buy for Me purchasing method, but I still have not received my payment.
